title: Merle Hagard leaves a drug for the Bakersfield Group for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people
subtitle: According to false news, the recently deceased rural music legend (Merle Haggard) left its entire property to a group of lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender persons.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The rural singer Merle Haggard left his entire property to a group of lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender persons.
